summary: The Streamlining Rural Housing Act of 2025 mandates the Secretaries of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) and Agriculture to create a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to streamline housing projects. The MOU will evaluate environmental exclusions, establish a lead agency, streamline environmental reviews, maintain environmental compliance, and assess a joint inspection process. An advisory working group of stakeholders will be formed to consult on the MOU's implementation. A report with recommendations to improve project efficiency will be submitted to relevant committees.
